p: After synthesis, the particles were washed and dried in an oven (80 °C), then heat-treated at 600 °C under different atmospheres ranging from air (oxygen partial pressure equal to 0.2 bar) to argon (about 10 −5 for the oxygen partial pressure) and oxygen partial pressures of 10 −2, 10 −3 and 10 −4 bar obtained by mixing argon and air gas flows.
